<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Login to the Google Search Console API client"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/google-search-console/authorize/init"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Call this API to go to the login page of the Google Search Console.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The account key","in":"query","name":"accountKey","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"The redirect URI to redirect to after the login","in":"query","name":"redirectUri","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}},{"description":"The state to maintain after authorize.","in":"query","name":"state","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"307":{"description":"Redirect to redirectUri value","headers":{"Location":{"description":"Redirect to google login page","schema":{},"style":"simple"}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
